Plot: Teenagers at a juvenile detention center, under the leadership of their counselor, gain self-esteem by playing football together.
Title: Gridiron Gang
Actors: Dwayne Johnson, Xzibit, L. Scott Caldwell, Leon Rippy
tomatoConsensus: The role of probation officer Sean Porter fits Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson like a glove; however, the execution is so cliched, the youths' stories (based on real events), fail to inspire.
